title: Top Apple, Google VPN Apps May Help China Spy on Users
summary: Top Apple, Google VPN Apps May Help China Spy on Users. Apple and Google espouse strong values about data privacy, but they allow programs from a Big Brother state to thrive on their app stores, researchers allege....
content: Apple and Google espouse strong values about data privacy, but they allow programs from a Big Brother state to thrive on their app stores, researchers allege.
